name: FRUIT
description: So far the best thing of all has been eating lots of fresh fruit!
myTake: Fresh fruit is living and energetic and is the healthiest food on the planet. When we eat protein, our body has to break it down into amino acids, and then synthesize protein from them. Fruit contains amino acids that our body can use to create protein! Humans are primates, and every other primate species on the planet eats 80%+ fruit. And just look how huge and muscular chimps and gorillas get! Dr. Robert Morse advocates for a mostly fruit diet, and fruit cleanses to heal the body. I've been eating mostly fruit for 3 weeks, as of this writing, and feel better than I have in years.

name: The Detox Miracle Sourcebook by Robert S. Morse N.D.
description: Raw Foods and Herbs for Complete Cellular Regeneration Paperback â€“ June 1, 2004
myTake: Dr. Morse is the master of detoxing and has CURED fibromyalgia patients, as well as cancer and diabetes patients, and much more, using herbs and this guide to detoxing with fruit. I've been blown away by his work and teachings and cannot overemphasize how much they have helped me.

name: Neotech Care Back Brace
description: Neotech Care Back Brace - Lumbar Support - Back Support Belt - Wide, Adjustable & Breathable - Small Size
myTake: If you are prone to muscle tightness like I am, including lower back pain, this item can be a huge help. When I get even the slightest lower back pain, I do two things: stretch my hamstrings, and put on this brace. Even though my fibro pain happens mostly in my legs, being able to reduce back pain when it arises has helped improve my quality of life without a doubt. This particular model works very well. It fits comfortable and is made to last. However, if you stretch your hamstrings and find that you still have a lot of lower back pain, you may want to check on the health of your kidneys.

name: Memory Foam Mattress Topper
description: 2 Inches of 100% Real Visco Elastic Foam | 3 lb density for High Support and High Response | Made in USA | CertiPUR-US Certified, Queen
myTake: A quality, comfy bed is key for anyone suffering from fibromyalgia or chronic pain. I was just reading Game of Thrones and there is a line describing the character Brienne, as she wakes up 'her legs stiff as wood from sleeping on the hard ground.' Well, no matter how great my mattress is, I might end up waking up feeling like Brienne. But it's a lot worse on bad mattress. Equally important to a good mattress, for me, is a memory foam topper. It relieves pressure from gravity by dispersing it and molding to your shape. Also, for folks that would have a hard time affording a good mattress right now, adding a nice thick topper can be a huge step in the right direction, and ultimately might be all you need!

name: Skechers
description: Skechers air cooled memory foam, Sport Women's Burst Fashion Sneaker
myTake: Comfy shoes are a must for anyone suffering from chronic pain! I have found Skechers brand to be the most consistently comfortable! This is just one model, but look for any of their shoes that have a memory foam insole, and are light-weight mesh. I'm wearing my pair of slip on On The Go Skechers, and I love them.

name: Lion's Mane Mushroom Extract
description: Host Defense - Lion's Mane Mushroom Extract, Natural Support for Mental Clarity, Focus, Memory, Cerebral and Nervous System Health, Non-GMO, Vegan, Organic, 60 Serving (2 Ounces)
myTake: I've been taking Lions Mane for about 6 months (as of this writing) and it is amazing. I have felt a small but noticeable increase in ability to focus, a decrease in anxiety, and best of all, a significant decrease in brain fog! I hesitate to say it cured my brain fog, but I would go as far as to say that Lion's Mane has played a huge role in making brain fog a rarity, where it used to be a normal part of every week. There are several brands out there, and many might be good, but Host Defense is owned by Paul Stamets, the godfather of mushrooms as medicine. I have personally used this brand to great effect, and it makes me happy to promote a product made by one of the true pioneers of this kind of medicine.

name: Himalayan Pink Salt
description: Sherpa Pink Himalayan Salt, 2 lbs Extra-Fine Grain
myTake: Processed table salt is missing tons of vital minerals, and is ground to death. Pink salt is full of great minerals, and is still holding its natural crystalline form. Plus it looks beautiful, and it's a lot less expensive than it used to be.

name: Slippery Elm Bark Powder
description: U.S Grown Organic Slippery Elm Bark Powder, 1 Pound, Powerfully Soothes the Throat and Reduces Coughing. Non-Irradiated, Non-Contaminated, Non-GMO
myTake: Slippery Elm has been used for hundreds, if not thousands of years for throat and gut health. It coats the lining of your stomach to protect it, which is great when we have fibro flare ups that could be triggered from food. It is also remarkably helpful for both constipation AND diarrhea! I keep these on hand at all times.

name: Black Chia Seeds
description: 365 Everyday Value, Organic Black Chia Seed, 15 Ounce
myTake: Chia Seeds have been a crucial addition to my diet. I eat two table spoons a day in a smoothie, after soaking them a few minutes to soften them up. They do more than any other food to keep me regular, and they are inexpensive, which is great. You can also make amazing raw pudding with them using coconut milk, bananas, and raw cacao powder

name: Raw Cacao Powder
description: Viva Naturals #1 Best Selling Certified Organic Cacao Powder from Superior Criollo Beans, 1 LB Bag
myTake: Full of magnesium, potassium, and iron, this super food tastes great, and packs a punch of vital nutrition. Besides, it really delicious. One beautiful step you can take to improving your health is eating raw cacao based chocolate treats instead of processed chocolate candies. A spoonful of this in coconut milk makes an amazing hot chocolate, for example.

name: Ear Plugs
description: DownBeats Reusable High Fidelity Hearing Protection: Ear Plugs for Concerts, Music, and Musicians (Clear Ear Plugs, Blue Case)
myTake: Not everyone with fibro has this problem, but sometimes my ears become very sensitive to noise. Once it was so bad, I was nearly in tears on the train ride home from work! Needless to say a good pair of ear plugs helped that tremendously. This brand works great, and comes with a handy keychain. Every little thing we can do to make our lives more comfortable is worth it when suffering from chronic pain or fibromyalgia.

name: Distilled Water
description: 1 CASE - 1 Gallon Poland Spring Distilled Water, 6 per case
myTake: Distilled water is down to just H2O with nothing else. No salts or impurities, no heavy metals, bacteria or viruses. While people argue that it may be unhealthy to drink in the long run, if you are doing a fast or detox, drinking distilled water is a great way to insure you are not adding any toxins to your body through your drinking water.

name: Nutiva Organic Hemp Protein
description: 16 oz. Sustainably Grown Canadian Hempseed, â€“Cold-Processed Seed from Non GMO (50% Protein). Organic Hemp Protein
myTake: OK, the biggest myth in the world today is that the human body needs protein. The human digestive system cannot even absorb it! When you eat protein, your body breaks it down into amino acids, and then uses those amino acids to build human protein usable by the body! Fruit contains all the amino acids your body needs! But, it's hard to get people to eat this way, and if you feel you need a protein supplement, hemp protein is absolutely fantastic. The world is full of protein powders and most of them destroy my digestion! Whey based especially. When I first found hemp protein powder, it improved my life considerably. It is easy to digest, in fact it feels great in my body. It even tastes pretty good! It also packs a considerable amount of fiber, and an amazing amount of vitamins and micro-nutrients to boot! This brand is great, although there are a few other brands which are just as good. Just look for any that includes only one ingredient: hemp.

name: IRIDOLOGY Chart Of EYE Reflexology
description: 1(Rainbow Coded), by Inner Light Resources Wall Chart â€“ November 20, 2006. Also known as "Eye Reflexology", this amazingly useful chart illustrates the places in the iris of the eye that show the health and healing condition of every organ and system of our body- mother nature's precise assessment tool.
myTake: I got my eye read and this is fascinating stuff! This chart can help you examine your own eye and see where you need to detox most.

name: Multispecies Probiotic Supplement
description: Klaire Labs Ther-Biotic Complete, 60 Vegetarian Capsules
myTake: When I did a gut health test through uBiome, my results came back, and I was very low on several healthy gut bacteria. Taking probiotics as a supplement can be an excellent way to introduce more healthy bacteria into the gut. Ideally, we will rebuild our own gut flora with a diet of mostly fruit! But in the mean time this can help a lot. I've used this brand, and my gut health has improved since I started taking it.

name: Klaire Labs Biotagen Powder Prebiotic Support
description: A versatile prebiotic formula to optimize gut microbiota and support bowel and immune system function.
myTake: Prebiotics feed the good bacteria in our guts. I started taking this brand after it was recommended by my nutritionist, and it definitely has helped. The best thing you can do for your gut health is to eat a mostly fruit diet, especially melons and berries, which will naturally encourage our gut flora. But for a less drastic change (and improvement) prebiotics can be added to a healthy diet and absolutely improve your digestion.

name: Nayoya Acupressure Mat
description: Nayoya Back and Neck Pain Relief - Acupressure Mat and Pillow Set - Relieves Stress, Back, Neck, and Sciatic Pain - Comes with a Vinyl Carry Bag for Storage and Travel - As Seen in USA Today
myTake: As I'm writing this, I have my mat on the back of my chair and I am leaning on it without a shirt on. The pokey points on are pressing into my skin just not quite enough to hurt, but enough to trigger my bodies endorphin response. That is how acupressure works! This mat is very versatile. You can put clothing in between you and the points if the pressure is too much. I like to stand on it in bare feet while I do things like brush my teeth. I often will put my legs across it when laying in bed. I can say this is one of my favorite purchases of the last year. It really does help me to feel less pain while you proceed on your healing journey.

name: Himalayan Pink Salt Rock Lamps
description: Himalayan Pink Salt Rock Lamps(11-15 lbs,8.5-11" Height) with Genuine Rubber Wood Base, Touch Dimmer Switch, 3 X 15 Watt Bulbs,UL Cord & Gift Box
myTake: This is definitely lower priority if you are on a budget, but these lamps can do a lot to make a room more pleasant to be in. It's been shown that these beautiful lamps can pull dust and allergens out of the air. They also produce negatively charged ions, but as far as I can tell the jury is still out on if they produce enough to have a benefit. There is speculation that they can relieve headaches, stress, and do other fabulous things too! But one thing is absolutely certain, they are beautiful and create a calm, tranquil atmosphere. When our bodies themselves are sometimes very unpleasant places to be in, I believe it is even more important for people with chronic pain to make their homes as comfortable and pleasant as possible. These lamps do a lot towards that end! I certainly love mine!
